# Transcribe & Summarize Audio

A small utility that turns any audio file, including WhatsApp voice messages, into:

* **`transcription.md`** â€“ a full markdown transcript produced by the `gpt-4oâ€‘transcribe` model.
* **`summary.md`** â€“ a concise bulletâ€‘point summary generated by the `o3` model.

The script accepts any of the formats supported by GPTâ€‘4oâ€‘transcribe (`flac`, `mp3`, `mp4`, `mpeg`, `mpga`, `m4a`, `ogg`, `wav`, `webm`) and will **autoâ€‘convert** `opus` recordings to `wav` via FFmpeg.
